scripts.build: npm run build:layouts && npm run build:jade && npm run build:stylus && npm run build:jekyll && npm run build:scripts && npm run doiuse
scripts.build:stylus: npm run compile-stylus && npm run build:prefix-css
scripts.build:prefix-main: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'ie >= 9, > 1%, last 2 versions, ios >= 7' < assets/_css/main.css   | csso > assets/css/main.css
scripts.build:scripts: npm run compile-coffee && npm run build:uglify
scripts.compile-coffee: rm assets/js/_scripts.js && cat assets/_js/main/*.coffee | coffee --compile --stdio >> assets/js/_scripts.js
scripts.postcompile-coffee: rm assets/js/_merc.js && cat assets/_js/merc/*.coffee | coffee --compile --stdio >> assets/js/_merc.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:layouts & npm run watch:jade & npm run watch:jekyll -s & npm run watch:stylus -s & npm run watch:css -s & npm run watch:coffee & npm run browser-sync
scripts.watch:prefix-css: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'ie >= 9, > 1%, last 2 versions, ios >= 7' < assets/_css/main.css > _site/assets/css/main.css
scripts.watch:coffee: watch 'npm run compile-coffee && npm run watch:uglify' assets/_js
